author: Dean W. Ball @deanwball
text:
hilarious that a podcaster can have a change of heart about ai progress (from "stupidly, comically, get-the-fuck-outta-here fast" to merely "the fastest technological progress trajectory of all time") and that this can be a meaningful trigger for a meltdown in the vibes of a centibillion dollar industry

this is still a young, thinly institutionalized field. it's part of what makes it exciting! probably also part of why a guy in his early 30s and a substack can post his way to the yada yada yada

vibes may be shifting back to "too high expectations of immediate-term progress," but such is life.
